mean_cn: v. 撕开，扯破，裂开，敲诈；  n. 裂缝，裂口
mean_en: to tear something or to become torn, often suddenly or violently; to remove something quickly or violently, often by pulling it; to copy sound or video files from a website or CD on to a computer; to change text or images into a form in which they can be displayed on a screen or printed
sentence: Oh no! I ripped both the red envelop and the money!
sentence_trans: 不！我把钱连同红包一起撕破了！
